example.text: Perpetrators committing unspeakable war crimes must be held to account. That’s what [[user]], [[user]] & I shared with the International Criminal Court Chief Prosecutor, Karim Khan. The US must work with the ICC & provide evidence of Russian atrocities in Ukraine. [[url]]

Always a pleasure to welcome my House colleagues to the Senate for lunch & conversation! Discussing priorities for Illinoisans across districts helps us toward our shared goal of vibrant & thriving communities. [[url]]

I spoke w/ the CEO of [[user]] about their investments in climate-conscious means of production and manufacturing biobased products. These investments will expand climate smart agriculture, and mean new jobs and new markets for IL. I will continue to work towards these goals. [[url]]
I know what is happening there from press reports. Their treatment of women is abominable.
Like we’ve said: if the Court won’t implement ethics reform itself, Congress must. This is the next step. [[url]]

Perpetrators committing unspeakable war crimes must be held to account. That’s what [[user]], [[user]] & I shared with the International Criminal Court Chief Prosecutor, Karim Khan. The US must work with the ICC & provide evidence of Russian atrocities in Ukraine. [[url]]
Like we’ve said: if the Court won’t implement ethics reform itself, Congress must. This is the next step. [[url]]
